title: Trapped in Glass
description: King Rolt has cast his poison daughters across the realm. With skirmishes on the Greenlyn border, Denwar preparing for battle, and Ralvek being drawn into the fray â€“ his daughters need only play their parts and Migorill will become the sole power in the land. That is, if everything proceeds as planned...Unfortunately for Rolt, the loyalties of blood are not as strong as he had hoped. Elizabeth, his second daughter, is determined to put the schemes of her father to an end. She has thrown her lot in with Adric, a Greenlyn Corporal, in an open declaration against her sire. He has seen the strength of Migorill's royal line, and if they should fail, Elizabeth will bring the fight to her father with her own two hands.Like father, like daughter.
author: Robert  Vincent
